EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_ENG_1_IHS_Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Analyst shows how to securely scale your network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> How to architect for secure service enablement A key concern for network engineers is how moving to IMS and VoLTE infrastructures will impact your network’s security, performance, and reliability. At the same time, operators must also balance profitability and agility for the future.
The recorded webinar, with Diane Myers from IHS Markit and Nokia, reveals:
- Key market trends for VoLTE, IMS, roaming and service enablement - How to securely increase network performance, reliability and profitibality - How to gain agility for the future - Lessons for tier 2-4 operators to learn from tier 1 deployments Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
